• In November, Tesla shareholders will vote on a proposal to pay Musk $1 trillion over the next decade
• Musk would only get that big figure if he hits a series of ambitious metrics, including 20 million vehicles delivered, 1 million robotaxis in commercial operation, and an $8.5 trillion valuation

items.title: Cache poisoning vulnerabilities found in 2 DNS resolving apps
bullets: • BIND, the Internet’s most widely used software for resolving domain names, is warning of two vulnerabilities
• The vulnerabilities stem from a logic error and a weakness in generating pseudo-random numbers
• They each carry a severity rating of 8.6
• Separately, makers of the Domain Name System resolver software Unbound warned of similar vulnerabilities

• The findings expose flaws in traditional counting methods and call for adaptive conservation measures
